report: Missha is a South Korean cosmetics brand owned by Able C&C Co., Ltd., a beauty and personal care company headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. Able C&C Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and has since grown into a significant player in the K-beauty industry, with Missha being one of its flagship brands. The company operates globally, with a strong presence in Asia, North America, and other international markets. According to publicly available financial reports and corporate disclosures, Able C&C Co., Ltd. is listed on the Korea Exchange (KRX: 078520), providing transparency into its shareholder structure. As of the latest filings, major shareholders include institutional investors and individual stakeholders, though specific percentages may vary over time. The company's headquarters are located at 13, Heolleung-ro, Seocho-gu, Seoul, South Korea. This location serves as the central hub for management, research and development, and marketing operations. In terms of workforce, Able C&C Co., Ltd. employs approximately 1,000 to 1,500 people globally, though exact numbers fluctuate due to seasonal hiring and market conditions. Missha products are manufactured in South Korea, with production facilities adhering to strict quality control standards. The company emphasizes its commitment to research and innovation, with a dedicated R&D center in Seoul. Independent sources, such as industry reports and market analyses, corroborate Able C&C's position as a mid-sized enterprise in the competitive K-beauty sector. For further verification, the company's annual reports and regulatory filings with the Korea Exchange provide detailed financial and operational data. Additionally, Missha's official website and press releases offer insights into its corporate strategy and market expansion efforts. Independent analyses from platforms like Statista and Euromonitor highlight Missha's brand recognition and market share within the affordable skincare segment. Overall, Missha, under Able C&C Co., Ltd., maintains a solid operational footprint with a focus on quality, innovation, and global market penetration.
